entity_mention.mention_text: those naughty naughty naughty little boys
The only guy both smart and brave enough to pull it off, expose the thing
the magistrate from Palermo who was so successful in prosecuting Mafia guys in the Maxi Trials, and got blown up for it along with his family
many friends and a large family in Sicily
